metadata.name: The Sinner's Mind
metadata.description:
Kira Venus...  
Kira Venus...

The accusing voices whisper in the air, while the all-seeing one demands. There is no mystery in the evidence, but who judges the killer of a goddess?

Kira Venus...  
Kira Venus...

The fear and desperation of those who know their part and destiny, and yet still seek forgiveness. Are we not all sinners waiting to be redeemed?

Kira Venus...

If time were not linear, could it have been avoided? Would they do it again? Who judges the sinner if the sinner does not feel like a sinner?

Kira Venus...

-  
2023.  
1/1 edition.  
2560x1440
